com.magnet.ctxprop.device

Interface MobileClientDeviceServices


  • @Contract
public interface MobileClientDeviceServices
    Provides a means for the server to access the current caller's mobile context, specifically the caller's device information.

    This information is available when the server is in the process of handling a Magnet mobile client's request. This feature is enabled on Android all of the time.

    The caller of these APIs should understand that as with any data coming from remote untrusted sources, the information provided can be masqueraded by a malicious client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCurrentUserUniqueDeviceId()
      An opaque token that should uniquely represent the mobile device of the caller regardless of the app the caller is using on the remote client.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentUserUniqueDeviceId

        String getCurrentUserUniqueDeviceId()
        An opaque token that should uniquely represent the mobile device of the caller regardless of the app the caller is using on the remote client. If this is not known, or if the call is not happening as part of the server's request to handle a Magnet mobile client, this value will be null.
